name: mindlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is stupid and has no purpose: Some children started mindlessly hurling stones at passing vehicles.
in a way that does not involve thought or mental effort: It was mindlessly dull work. See
mindless
More examplesFewer examplesThey sat around mindlessly watching TV.They slowed down and stared mindlessly at the crash.The soldiers were mindlessly obeying orders.The vehicle's navigation system will guide us mindlessly to our destination.We were mindlessly guided against our will.
